title: Coinflipper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Flip the coin for two people each night. If it's heads, you deal an Unstoppable attack to them. If it's tails, you deal an Unstoppable attack to them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 65
*Heads, I win. Tails, you lose.*
